actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a program to alleviate siltation problems at Quincy Bay and Broad and Triangle Lake areas, Illinois.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study and alleviate the siltation problems on the Mississippi River upstream of Mile 300, particularly at the Quincy Bay, Broad Lake, and Triangle Lake areas in Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a program to alleviate siltation problems at Quincy Bay and Broad and Triangle Lake areas, Illinois.
